'''''Minecraft: Pixel Drift''''' is a remix album featuring compositions by Lena Raine, Kumi Tanioka, Aaron Cherof, and Amos Roddy, with remixes by floopy, Synthion, [[Hyper Potions]], Turbo, meganeko, and EX-LYD. It remixes tracks from ''[[Minecraft: The Wild Update (Original Game Soundtrack)]]'', ''[[Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs (Original Game Soundtrack)]]'', ''[[Minecraft: Trails & Tales (Original Game Soundtrack)]]'', and ''[[Minecraft: Chase the Skies (Original Game Soundtrack)]]''. It was released on September 3, 2025.
